description:
Linux, Cloud, Virtualization and hundreds other buzz words are out there to blow your mind. This session will share real life examples that actually make sense and deliver meaningful easy to use services to end users with minimum efforts from cloud administrators. A deeper introduction to Containers technology will be presented and will be helpful to anyone, especially for people familiar with any other virtualization solution for Linux. Overview of Parallels Commercial management tools for Containers and clouds with open command line and XML APIs will show how to bring an infrastructure cloud solution to life.

   • Sponsored by Parallels
title: How Linux Containers Fit your Cloud
